bannerDescribe: Welcome to our website! Are you looking for a taxi? Feel free to contact us! We are available 24/7.
aboutUsDescribe: VIP Taxi Mechelen serves individuals and businesses in the Mechelen region and surrounding cities. We also provide transportation to and from national and international airports. Contact us at +32-484510519, we are at your service 24 hours a day, 7 days a week (even on holidays)! We distinguish ourselves from other transportation companies in Mechelen with our customer-oriented service, quality, and competitive prices. VIP Taxi Mechelen is known as a modern company that prioritizes quality and safety. 365 days a year, 24 hours a day.
testimonialsDescribe: What our customers say about us
testimonial1describe: I needed a last-minute ride, and VIP Taxi Mechelen came to the rescue immediately. Fast service and very professional. Definitely recommended!
testimonial2describe: From the moment of booking to arrival, everything went smoothly with VIP Taxi Mechelen. The driver was polite, and the vehicle was impeccable. Will definitely use again!
testimonial3describe: I've been using the services of VIP Taxi Mechelen for business trips for some time now. Always punctual, reliable, and the drivers are true professionals. Top service!
testimonial4describe: I was a bit nervous about my first solo trip to Mechelen, but the warmth and friendliness of my VIP Taxi driver made everything right. I felt like I was traveling with an old friend. Thank you very much!
Lukas De GrooteDescribe: My ride with VIP Taxi Mechelen was nothing short of a little pampering moment in my busy day! A friendly chat, a comfortable ride, and a smile that lingered long after arrival. Wonderful!
faq1: Do you accept credit cards as a payment method?
faq1describe: Yes, we accept credit cards as a payment method for our taxi services in Mechelen. We also offer other payment options such as cash and debit cards.
faq2: What are the benefits of taking a taxi in Mechelen?
faq2describe: Taking a taxi in Mechelen offers various benefits, including convenience, speed, and comfort. You don't have to worry about parking or finding a parking spot, and you will be taken directly to your destination.
faq3: Can I book a taxi for a specific time?
faq3describe: Yes, you can book a taxi for a specific time. When making the reservation, you can specify the desired time when you need the taxi so that we can ensure a taxi is available at the time you prefer.
faq4: How can I book a taxi in Mechelen?
faq4describe: You can easily book a taxi in Mechelen by calling us at +32-484510519 or by making a reservation on our website. We also have a mobile app that allows you to book a taxi quickly and conveniently.
faq5describe: For full transparency, VIP Taxi Mechelen provides an indication of our standard rates. For detailed information on personalized quotes, you can contact us directly.
faq6: Are your taxis in Mechelen equipped with air conditioning?
faq6describe: Yes, all our taxis in Mechelen are equipped with air conditioning. We aim to provide you with a comfortable and pleasant ride, regardless of the weather.
paymentdescribe: You can pay with cash, via Payconiq, Visa, or by invoice. To secure your transportation, we recommend contacting us via email. This way, you can also request a free quote at the same time. We are available 24/7 and guarantee a pleasant and punctual service.
